text: Zamagra tusi koro nehanageno hankave vihu zamimo'a, faragu vaziramigahie. Ana nehanige'za sondia vahe zamire'ma ugota hu'naza vahe'mo'zama ha'mofo avame'zama nege'za koro atre'za fregahaze. Saioni agonarema tevema neregeno Jerusalemi kumapima tevenefa'anema mani'nea Ra Anumzamo ama ana nanekea huama hu'ne.
